thought: The Slack action is currently implemented with params that look correct, but the execution error indicates there is a problem with the workflow issues related to Slack message sending. The Slack action params may be missing or incorrect, or the Slack integration requires additional mandatory parameters. I will review the Slack action params and re-implement it with all required fields, including 'select', 'channelId', 'messageType', and 'text' with the correct expression to extract text from input_data. I will also add comments and TODOs for further testing.
plan: Set Slack action params with 'select' as 'channel' and 'channelId' mode as 'name' with value 'general'.
Set 'messageType' to 'text' and 'text' param to '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract message text from input_data.
Test the Slack action again to verify message delivery.
If error persists, check the Slack integration documentation for required parameters.
criticism: The Slack action params are currently empty in the code snippet, which will cause the action to fail. Providing complete and correct params is essential for the Slack message to be sent successfully.

tool_input.comments: Send formatted messages to Slack channel 'general' with correct params.
